Templates.Template: Define temp-table [+tablename+] fields [+fieldname+] as [+fieldtype+] index is primary [+indexname+] [+fieldname+].

FUNCTION [+functionName+] RETURNS [+returnformat+]([+parameter+] as [+parameterFormat+]) forward. FUNCTION [+functionName+] RETURNS [+returnformat+]([+parameter+] as [+parameterFormat+]): /* ----------------------------------------------------------- Purpose: Parameters: <none> Notes: -------------------------------------------------------------*/
return . END FUNCTION. /*FUNCTION [+functionName+]*/
DO ON ERROR UNDO, LEAVE: ^ END.

batchrun = yes. input from value([+bpfilename+] + ".bpi"). output to value([+bpfilename+] + ".bpo") keep-messages. hide message no-pause. cimrunprogramloop: do on stop undo cimrunprogramloop,leave cimrunprogramloop: {gprun.i ""[+procedurefile+]""} end. hide message no-pause. output close. input close. batchrun = no.

define variable srcDir as character. define variable destDir as character. define variable src as character. assign src = "[+sourceCode+]". assign srcDir = "[+SourceDirectory+]". assign destDir = "[+DestDirectory+]". propath = srcDir + "," + propath. compile value(src) save into value(destDir). propath = substring(propath,length(srcDir) + 1).

form space(1)
with frame [+formname+] side-labels width 80 attr-space /*V8! title color normal (getFrameTitle([+"LabelTerm"+],60)) */. setFrameLabels(frame [+formname+]:handle).
do transaction on endkey undo, leave: run [+programName+]. message "Undo". pause. undo. end.

repeat with frame [+frameName+]:
end. /* repeat with frame [+frameName+]: */

[+mainloop+]: do on error undo [+mainloop+], retry [+mainloop+] on endkey undo [+mainloop+], leave [+mainloop+]:
end. /* do on error undo [+mainloop+] */
define variable trrecid as recid. assign trrecid = current-value(tr_sq01). where tr_trnbr > integer(trrecid).
DO i = 1 to length([+source+]). If index("0987654321.", substring([+source+],i,1)) = 0 then do: end. end.
